scripts.server: export DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run dev --prefix runner
scripts.build-client: export DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run create-default --prefix runner && export REACT_APP_DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix runner && npm install --prefix builtins/js && npm run compile --prefix builtins/js && npm run build-client
